医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究确定遗传与青少年精神病理学的关联当试图了解基因如何影响青少年行为时，圣路易斯华盛顿大学的研究人员采取了“大拖网”方法，将他们的网撒得很广，以收集构成我们是谁的所有可测量的特征、行为和环境。并检查与包含心理健康问题风险的遗传构件的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Study-identizes-genic-associations-with-youth-psychopathology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Study-identizes-genic-associations-with-youth-psychopathology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14d9596b-c1ee-45c1-9bb5-1cd218e390f5 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 14:00:22 -0400 Study identifies genetic associations with youth psychopathology
依达拉奉在靶向脑肿瘤干细胞方面显示出前景胶质母细胞瘤是一种侵袭性脑肿瘤，尽管采用手术、放疗和化疗等标准治疗，但中位生存时间仍不到 22 个月。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Edaravone-shows-promise-in-targeting-brain-tumor-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Edaravone-shows-promise-in-targeting-brain-tumor-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e113df4a-2554-413e-9c86-2ac1a9dc86fc Thu, 17 Oct 2024 13:49:19 -0400 Edaravone shows promise in targeting brain tumor stem cells
研究确定了肝癌免疫治疗成功的生物标志物根据威尔康奈尔医学研究人员的一项临床前研究，可能很快就能确定哪些患有肝细胞癌的肝癌患者将从免疫治疗中受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Study-identizes-biomarkers-for-immunotherapy-success-in-liver-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Study-identizes-biomarkers-for-immunotherapy-success-in-liver-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=089a4852-bdb0-42fa-a59f-ddb1b04325b5 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 13:40:39 -0400 Study identifies biomarkers for immunotherapy success in liver cancer
苏黎世大学研究人员利用人工智能检测抗生素耐药性苏黎世大学 (UZH) 的研究人员利用人工智能 (AI) 来帮助识别抗生素耐药细菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/UZH-researchers-harness-AI-to-detect-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/UZH-researchers-harness-AI-to-detect-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b454bf44-9e6d-4613-9aae-fcc262b22cfc Thu, 17 Oct 2024 13:18:00 -0400 UZH researchers harness AI to detect antibiotic resistance
巴西-意大利联合实验室专注于阿尔茨海默氏症药物开发自称巴西-意大利合作热衷者的研究员 Laura Bolognesi 在博洛尼亚大学 (UNIBO) 药学与生物技术系创建了 B2AlzD2 联合实验室，这是第一个致力于开发新药的巴西-博洛尼亚联合实验室。治疗阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Brazil-Italy-joint-lab-focuses-on-Alzheimere28099s-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Brazil-Italy-joint-lab-focuses-on-Alzheimere28099s-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58da450d-ac67-4c15-a498-3672074c2fe9 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 13:05:28 -0400 Brazil-Italy joint lab focuses on Alzheimer’s drug development
波士顿大学和葛兰素史克合作应对肺纤维化波士顿大学再生医学中心 (CReM) 和波士顿医学中心 (BMC) 的研究人员宣布与全球生物制药公司葛兰素史克 (GSK) 开展新合作，推进创新研究，重点开发尖端模型来研究和治疗肺病等肺部疾病纤维化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Boston-University-and-GSK-collaborate-to-tackle-pulmonary-太多纤维化.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Boston-University-and-GSK-collaborate-to-tackle-pulmonary-chemistry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78aa1ef2-5772-4c7d-a0cc-d206c8d65c42 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 12:56:01 -0400 Boston University and GSK collaborate to tackle pulmonary fibrosis
创新传感器材料提供非侵入性癌症诊断韩国材料科学研究所先进生物和保健材料研究部的 Ho Sang Jung 博士领导的研究小组开发了一种创新的传感器材料，可以放大体液（唾液、粘液、尿液、等）并使用人工智能分析它们来诊断癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Innovative-sensor-material-offers-non-guarantee-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Innovative-sensor-material-offers-non-operative-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac35719a-7bfa-4add-a101-1b9da7719d6a Thu, 17 Oct 2024 12:52:35 -0400 Innovative sensor material offers non-invasive cancer diagnosis
新拨款旨在改变肝癌的治疗目前，肝癌有几种可用的治疗选择，包括免疫疗法和一类称为酪氨酸激酶抑制剂（TKI）的药物的组合，但其长期效果有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/New-grant-aims-to-transform-treatment-for-liver-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/New-grant-aims-to-transform-treatment-for-liver-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91604702-c405-4400-9318-e3ff6db5e568 Thu, 17 Oct 2024 12:46:16 -0400 New grant aims to transform treatment for liver cancer
来自真菌的新化合物有望治疗结直肠癌来自真菌的新型化合物可以为治疗结直肠癌提供新的视角，结直肠癌是世界上最常见和最致命的癌症之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/New-compounds-from-fungi-show-promise-in-treating-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/New-compounds-from-fungi-show-promise-in-treating-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f54d61cc-b2ed-42ed-b87a-d03375e0231a Thu, 17 Oct 2024 12:42:01 -0400 New compounds from fungi show promise in treating colorectal cancer
试验评估单克隆抗体长期预防新冠肺炎的效果威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员领导了第一项随机、安慰剂对照临床试验，评估了治疗性单克隆抗体对长期感染新冠病毒风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Trial-evaluates-monoclonal-antibodies-for-long-COVID-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241017/Trial-evaluates-monoclonal-antibodies-for-long-COVID-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50a55402-7b0c-4089-afbf-073431c7ebfc Thu, 17 Oct 2024 12:29:13 -0400 Trial evaluates monoclonal antibodies for long COVID prevention
